import React from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import data from './data.json' import { useState } from 'react'; function Technology() { const vehicle = data.technology[0]; const spaceport = data.technology[1]; const capsule = data.technology[2]; const [machine,setMachine] = useState(vehicle); return (
03 SPACE LAUNCH 101
THE TERMINOLOGY...

{machine.name}

{machine.description}

) } export default Technology
